Men’s Underwear Size Chart

"},{"value":"","tableData":{"columns":[{"id":"col1","name":"Size","type":"key","order":0},{"id":"col2","name":"Waist (cm)","type":"value","order":1},{"id":"col3","name":"Hip (cm)","type":"value","order":2}],"rows":[{"id":"row1","order":0,"col1":"S","col2":"71 - 76","col3":"86 - 91"},{"id":"row2","order":1,"col1":"M","col2":"77 - 84","col3":"92 - 99"},{"id":"row3","order":2,"col1":"L","col2":"85 - 91","col3":"100 - 107"},{"id":"row4","order":3,"col1":"XL","col2":"92 - 99","col3":"108 - 114"},{"id":"row5","order":4,"col1":"XXL","col2":"100 - 107","col3":"115 - 122"}],"isConvertUnit":false,"defaultUnit":"Centimeter","sizeRange":"columns"},"typeConfig":"advanced_table","tableId":1761158735891},{"value":"","imgSrc":"https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/avada-size-chart-stag.appspot.com/o/charts_content%2F4hHyREkCY9Q2c5Nmhuj0%2F1747731474837-Frame%201948756090.png?alt=media&token=c56751a3-80dd-4035-b002-5375b071a45a","typeConfig":"image"},{"value":"

How to Measure:

Use a soft measuring tape. Stand straight, breathe normally, and don’t pull the tape too tight

  • Waist: Measure around your natural waistline (narrowest part, above hips).
  • Hip: Measure around the fullest part of your buttocks/hips, keeping tape level.
"},{"value":"

For comfy undies, they should fit snugly but not too tight, and the waistband should stay put. The right size means no chafing and all-day comfort. Different styles fit differently, so always check the size chart to be sure!
